english.segment1: Chorus: Every time I fall a little bit harder. Every time I fall a little bit farther. Every time I fall. I fall right back into your arms
english.segment2: Every time I try. To explain the reason why. I have let you down. I fall to the ground
english.segment3: What is it you see in me. That makes you believe. No matter how far I stray. I will still find the way
english.segment4: Just when I think I'm not strong enough. You reach out to me and you lift me up
english.segment6: Time and time again. When I think I've reached the end. It's your voice I hear. That draws me near
english.segment7: I don't know what makes you stay. When I act this way. No matter what we've been through. I can turn to you
english.segment8: Just when I think I'm not strong enough. You reach out to me and you lift me up
english.segment10: You find the beauty in my imperfections. The guiding light in all my misdirection. And when I think you've finally given up. You fill my heart with unconditional love
english.segment11: Every time I fall. I fall back in your arms
